author.name: Brother Arnulfus
author.description: A Benedictine monk who doth write devotional poems in Ænglish, praising God and the saints. His poems are often humorous, short, and satirical. They often contain metaphors of alcohol, especially wine or ale.

newsMedieval:
For Treasury's stead, seeks Trump a sage,
Of Wall Street's golden lineage.
Yet truth in wine, as monks do know,
Experience proves a fickle beau.

Gold waxeth high in market's dance,
As rate-cut dreams doth markets enhance.
Like ale in barrel, froth to crest,
Such is the gold's inflated jest.

In yonder market, oil doth climb,
With news of rates cut in due time.
Yet, mindful be of this decree,
In wine, as oil, lies no guarantee.

feedItems.title: Trump Eyes High-Profile Wall Street, D.C. Veterans for Treasury Secretary
feedItems.description: The former president and his aides view experience in finance as a key factor in the selection.

feedItems.title: Gold Rises to Record High, Boosted by Rate-Cut Expectations
feedItems.description: Gold prices rose to record highs as a softer U.S. inflation reading last week boosts hopes that the Fed will kickstart its rate-cutting cycle in June.

feedItems.title: Oil Edges Higher as U.S. Inflation Data Boosts June Rate-Cut Hopes
feedItems.description: Oil prices edged higher after U.S. Fed Chair Jerome Powell said last week that the latest inflation data align with what the central bank would like to see, bolstering market bets for a June rate cut.

author.name: Guillemette de Ventadour
author.description: A whimsical troubadour from Occitania, who cherishes the company of nature's gentle creatures. She often includes metaphors of goats, dogs, rabbits, and snails in her poetry. Her writing style is terse.

newsMedieval:
The Nikkei's fall, a flight of doves in winter's grip,
By chip and finance, stocks do slip.
Like ramps tumbling in the market's trip,
A snail's loss in the economic dip.

In Japan's land, where cherry blossoms bloom in spring,
A JGB auction stirs, a hopeful zing.
Rabbits' ears pricked at the fiscal ring,
Good demand may this new year bring.

To last year's peak, might USD/IDR tread,
In strength and rise, much like a stag's proud head.
Yet caution, dear goat, for markets oft misled,
Tis not always green in the economic bed.

feedItems.title: Nikkei Falls 1.4%, Dragged by Chip, Financial Stocks
feedItems.description: Japanese stocks ended lower, dragged by falls in chip-related and financial shares.

feedItems.title: Japan's 10-Year JGB Auction on Tuesday May Attract Good Demand
feedItems.description: Japan’s 10-year JGB auction on Tuesday may attract good demand from investors, given it’s the start of the new fiscal year, Citi said.

feedItems.title: USD/IDR May Test Last Year's Peak of 15,965.00 This Week, Chart Shows
feedItems.description: The anticipated strength of USD/IDR has exceeded UOB’s expectations and the currency pair continues to rise.

author.name: Æthelred the Skald
author.description: A Norse poet who doth regale his audience with tales of gods and heroes, praising their might and prowess. He references Norse mythology and history in his poems. He is known for metaphors involving the sea and the weather and weaponry.

newsMedieval:
From the East, where the sly wolf prowls, a tale unfolds,
Of shadow trade in parts of war, by Russian mastermolds.
In night's cloak they weave their work, unbeknownst to Yankie swords,
Through the crypt-hold of tethered coin, they slip the old world's cords.

In the forum where gold is weaved, echoes a change foretold,
The Seven Mighty, now only Four, yet the beast continues bold.
No longer tied to apple's might or Tesla's lightning spark,
The market rallies merrily, lit by other fires in the dark.

News from the East, of the Dragon's brood, serpents who guard the gates,
Temu parent, PDD, in secrets, their trade allocates.
A covenant forged not in trust, but in the chains of law,
The cost of freedom, a dragon's hoard, a price too raw and raw.

feedItems.title: Crypto FuelsRussian Shadow Trade for Weapons Parts
feedItems.description: How Russian middlemen used the cryptocurrency tether to avoid U.S. sanctions and procure parts for drones and high-tech weapons.

feedItems.title: The Stock Market's Magnificent Seven Is Now the Fab Four
feedItems.description: Some investors say it is a bullish signal that the market is rallying without the likes of Apple and Tesla because it means other groups are taking part.

feedItems.title: Chinese E-Commerce Giant Squeezes Workers With Noncompete Agreements
feedItems.description: Temu parent PDD enforces a culture of corporate secrecy by suing some former employees.

author.name: Conchobar mac Dubhthach
author.description: An Irish bard of yore, who weaves dulcet melodies that capture hearts with tender love songs. With a quill dipped in courtly love, he pens metaphors of devotion, igniting the flames of passion in every soul who hears his verse.

newsMedieval:
Of Chef Andrés, his sails unfurled in sovereign seas,
The Pentagon did fall behind, a sighing summer breeze.
With World Central Kitchen, he pledged aid of the choicest pea,
His cuisine, a love song, to Gaza's weary plea.

Amid clouds of flight and azure skies, Boeing stumbles yet,
Safety checks, quality control, a dance of deep regret.
Three months hence, solutions sought, to mend the factory's song,
For all who voyage in their craft, pray the tune be strong.

Hardy workers seeking lives across the border's reign,
Find in business owners an ally against the strain.
The lawmakers may seek to quell, with laws both harsh and wrong,
Yet in fellow man, we find a love that's ever strong.

feedItems.title: The Celebrity Chef Who Beat the U.S. Military at Getting Aid Into Gaza
feedItems.description: As the Pentagon embarks on a project to create a maritime aid route, José Andrés’s World Central Kitchen has already begun delivering food by sea.

feedItems.title: Why Boeing's Quality Controls and Plane Safety Checks Still Miss Mistakes
feedItems.description: Boeing was given 90 days to present regulators with an action plan to address quality-control issues at its 737 factory. Here’s a look at the layers of Boeing’s quality process and the issues each faces.

feedItems.title: Business owners are resisting the Republican state lawmakers who are trying to deter migrants from illegally entering the U.S. by making it tougher for them to find work.
feedItems.description: Business owners are resisting the Republican state lawmakers who are trying to deter migrants from illegally entering the U.S. by making it tougher for them to find work.
